comments.body:
Can this be changed to

`import * as XDateLocaleConfig ...` to match the styles above?

Hi @Tyler-Zhang 

When I replace `import XDateLocaleConfig = require('xdate');` with `import * as XDateLocaleConfig from 'xate';` I have an error raised on import:


> This module can only be referenced with ECMAScript imports/exports by turning on the 'esModuleInterop' flag and referencing its default export.ts(2497)
